markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Darg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2260) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 106 **Perception** +20; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** -2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_, [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [sack with 5 rocks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=45) --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +19 **Will** +22 **HP** 250 **[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)**
--- **Speed** 35 feet **Melee** _greatclub_ +27 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 3d10+13 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d6+13 bludgeoning **Ranged** rock +23 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8+13 bludgeoning **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** **Knockback** **Requirements** The hill giant's last action was a successful melee Strike; **Effect** The hill giant's swing drives their enemy back. They push the foe back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38). The hill giant can follow the foe as normal on a successful Shove. **Wide Swing** The hill giant makes a single greatclub Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the hill giant's multiple attack penalty.
name: Darg

text: Darg Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 40 Unspecific Lore : DC 38 Specific Lore : DC 35 Darg Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 106 Perception +20; low-light vision Languages Common, Jotun Skills Athletics +25, Intimidation +20 Str +7 Dex +2 Con +5 Int -2 Wis +4 Cha +0 Items +1 striking greatclub , Hide Armor, sack with 5 rocks --- AC 33 Fort +24 Ref +19 Will +22 HP 250 Catch Rock Reaction --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action greatclub +27 (Backswing, reach 10 feet, Shove), Damage 3d10+13 bludgeoning Melee Single Action fist +26 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d6+13 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action rock +23 (Brutal, range increment 120 feet), Damage 2d8+13 bludgeoning Throw Rock Single Action Knockback Single Action Requirements The hill giant's last action was a successful melee Strike; Effect The hill giant's swing drives their enemy back. They push the foe back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful Shove. The hill giant can follow the foe as normal on a successful Shove. Wide Swing Single Action The hill giant makes a single greatclub Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the hill giant's multiple attack penalty.
